game.name: Fickle Card Legend
game.shortDescription: A side-scrolling, non-turn-based card battle game. Level up, collect gear, and challenge stages and bosses with a unique card-clash combat system.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A side-scrolling, non-turn-based card battle game. Level up, collect gear, and challenge stages and bosses with a unique card-clash combat system.

reviewHighlights.text: 核心内容还原的挺好的，仿佛回到了学生时代钻祖玛神殿时候的日子
好玩爱玩 根本停不下来 刷就完事儿了 想停就停 想刷就刷 非常适合碎片时间（摸鱼）和晚上安抚好家庭后尽情投入一些时间~
